title:
Appearance of Strauss-type exponent in semilinear wave equations with
  time-dependent speed of propagation
authors: Motohiro Sobajima, Kimitoshi Tsutaya and Yuta Wakasugi
abstract:
In this paper, blowup phenomenon for the semilinear wave equation with
time-dependent speed of propagation and scattering damping is considered under
the smallness of initial data. Our result contains small data blowup for
sub-Strauss exponent for the simplest semilinear wave equation and also the one
for semilinear generalized Tricomi equation. Key ingredient is so-called test
function method (developed in Ikeda--Sobajima--Wakasa [10]) with a certain
conservative quantity via a special solution with the Liouville--Green (or WKB)
approximation.
